article.headline: Xavier 60, Dayton 55
article.story: CINCINNATI (AP) -- Brian Thornton scored 19 points, grabbed 12 rebounds and blocked five shots, leading Xavier to a 60-55 win over Dayton on Saturday. Justin Cage scored 12 points for Xavier (13-4, 4-2 Atlantic 10) including two key free throws with 16 seconds left as the Musketeers broke a two-game losing streak. Xavier's Stanley Burrell scored 11 points. Brian Roberts led Dayton (10-11, 2-5) with 20 points. Jimmy Binnie pulled the Flyers to 56-55 with 32 seconds remaining after the Musketeers had led by 10 points with 4 minutes remaining. Burrell then made a foul shot with 30 seconds left to push the lead back to two. Roberts missed a tying jumper with 20 seconds left, Cage grabbing the rebound and then being fouled. His two free throws put the Musketeers in control, with Dedrick Finn adding a late foul shot. Binnie finished with 10 points for Dayton, which shot 35.4 percent from the field (23-of-65). Xavier, which shot 41.2 percent (21-of-51) on field goals has won the last 21 meetings on its home court in the long rivalry. Dayton last won in Cincinnati on Jan. 10, 1981, at the Riverfront Coliseum.

statistics.description: The number of points scored.

statistics.description: Free Throw makes and attempts.

statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.

statistics.description: The average number of assists a player or team records per turnover
